name: falling bricks- ursina
description:
the cuboid people of planet Cearth are bieng attacked by the brick people!! how long can you survive against the increasing number of falling bricks! 

this is a game that I tend to make when I try out new engines, or languages, This week I learned the ursina engine (https://www.ursinaengine.org/) and I was happy enough with the project to upload it here!

to play just open the bat file in the download folder!
